project: This site is a love letter to books by underrepresented authors. It was built to celebrate diverse voices and make them more accessible to readers everywhere.
creator: Hi👋🏼I'm Cecy, a sociologist and computer scientist who loves exploring how tech shapes our world. I built this site because I’m passionate about books and believe there are voices that deserve more space. This project is my way of contributing to promoting works from authors from underrepresented backgrounds and making it easier for readers to discover new stories. Hope you find something you love here!
